citations.narrative:
Interior surfaces. The wooden floor, shelf, and patch on the north wall have areas of bare wood. Surfaces of indoor guinea
pig facilities must be constructed and maintained so that they are impervious to moisture and can be repeatedly sanitized.
The bare wood must be sealed or covered with a surface that is impervious to moisture. Correct by February 28, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.26(d) 
   
Facilities, indoor. 
Interior surfaces. The wooden floor, shelf, and patch on the north wall have areas of bare wood. Surfaces of indoor guinea 
pig facilities must be constructed and maintained so that they are impervious to moisture and can be repeatedly sanitized. 
The bare wood must be sealed or covered with a surface that is impervious to moisture. Correct by February 28, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
